constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx (immutable paths).
Backend remains a single Motoko actor (backend/main.mo); do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Implement real backend prize validation, activation, identity verification, or delivery submission logic (current behavior is mocked).
Add new flow steps or change the existing step order/logic.
Integrate third-party authentication providers (only Internet Identity is supported).
